children.name: Next LvL Ai ("we," "our," or "us") is dedicated to safeguarding the privacy and security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains the types of information we collect, how we use and protect it, and the choices you have regarding your information.

• For users integrating with Zoom, we collect and store links to your meeting/phone call transcripts, analyzing these to provide you with valuable insights regarding those meetings and associating these insights with your contacts in HubSpot based on the attendee email addresses for that meeting.

For users integrating with Zoom, we collect and store links to your meeting/phone call transcripts, analyzing these to provide you with valuable insights regarding those meetings and associating these insights with your contacts in HubSpot based on the attendee email addresses for that meeting.

• For users integrating with Google, we collect and store links to your Google Meet transcript Google Doc files, then analyze these files with artificial intelligence to provide you with key insights. We also find meeting attendee email addresses using a Google Calendar Integration. Through integration with Gmail we can automatically draft follow up emails to your clients based on the outcomes of your meetings.

For users integrating with Google, we collect and store links to your Google Meet transcript Google Doc files, then analyze these files with artificial intelligence to provide you with key insights. We also find meeting attendee email addresses using a Google Calendar Integration. Through integration with Gmail we can automatically draft follow up emails to your clients based on the outcomes of your meetings.
• Your meeting and call transcripts may be integrated with your HubSpot CRM account to offer relevant data and insights to enhance your sales processes.
Your meeting and call transcripts may be integrated with your HubSpot CRM account to offer relevant data and insights to enhance your sales processes.
• Text from your meeting and call transcripts may be processed using our custom integrations with external AI models in order to provide accurate details about your meetings.
Text from your meeting and call transcripts may be processed using our custom integrations with external AI models in order to provide accurate details about your meetings.

a. We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no data transmission or storage system can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.
a. We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this Privacy Policy.
a. You may opt-out of certain data collection and processing activities. Please contact us at tanner_green@nextlvlai.com for more information.
a. You may request access to the personal information we hold about you and update or correct it. To do so, contact us at tanner_green@nextlvlai.com.
a. We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. The date of the latest revision will be indicated at the top of the policy. Please review this page for any changes.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: Email: tanner_green@nextlvlai.com Phone: 503-880-9048
By using our software and services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
